plot: An autobiographical documentary about hesitations to enter into motherhood. This personal film uses inner reflections as a prism to look at contemporary parenting and changing expectations of women.
title: I Love Children, But...
plot_es: An autobiographical documentary about hesitations to enter into motherhood. This personal film uses inner reflections as a prism to look at contemporary parenting and changing expectations of women.
